channel.title: CVE Feed for charlestsmith -- Word Replacer Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-1733|2024-03-16T05:39:58.385Z -- charlestsmith -- Word Replacer Pro
item.description: The Word Replacer Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the word_replacer_ultra() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update arbitrary content on the affected WordPress site.
